title: Poached salmon with mustard cream sauce
ingredients: ['6 salmon fillets, with skin', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '900ml water', '600ml dry white wine', '225ml soured cream', '1 to 2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '4 teaspoons lemon juice', '4 teaspoons honey', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', 'chopped chives, to taste']
